name: part_002
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Mio, Fubuki, and Ayame talk about a 'Holo no Graffiti' episode and share a birthday cake.

subtitles.original: 公開されたホロぐらの話！
subtitles.english: The Hologra talk that was released!

subtitles.original: 内容はですね、遅れた七夕でした！
subtitles.english: The content was, a late Tanabata!

subtitles.original: 七夕回、遅れた七夕回ありましたね。
subtitles.english: The Tanabata episode, there was a late Tanabata episode, wasn't there?

subtitles.original: ありました！
subtitles.english: There was!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、そのホロぐら内で、一番最後に喋った白上のセリフはなんだ？
subtitles.english: Well then, in that Hologra, what was Shirakami's very last line?

subtitles.original: えっ？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: あ、なんか... え、来年も会おうね、みたいな感じだったっけ？
subtitles.english: Ah, something like... eh, "let's meet again next year," was it something like that?

subtitles.original: それでいいですか？
subtitles.english: Are you sure about that?

subtitles.original: ファイナルアンサーですか？
subtitles.english: Is that your final answer?

subtitles.original: いいですか？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと、え、ひ、ヒント、ヒント、ヒント！
subtitles.english: Wait, uh, h-hint, hint, hint!

subtitles.original: ヒントは、何かに対してのツッコミでした！
subtitles.english: The hint is, it was a comeback to something!

subtitles.original: えー、じゃあ違うじゃん！
subtitles.english: Eh, then that's wrong!

subtitles.original: なんだったっけな... いや、見た、見た、これ見たんだよ！
subtitles.english: What was it... no, I saw it, I saw it, I definitely saw this!

subtitles.original: えーっと、なんか短冊に対してのなんか、やつだったような気がするんだけど...
subtitles.english: Umm, I feel like it was something about a tanzaku...

subtitles.original: えーっと、『この願い事でいいんかい！』みたいなやつ！
subtitles.english: Umm, something like "Is this wish really okay?!"

subtitles.original: 不正解ー！
subtitles.english: Incorrect!

subtitles.original: 残念でしたー。うちのケーキ...
subtitles.english: Too bad. My cake...

subtitles.original: 余がケーキ食べちゃいたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I think I'll eat the cake!

subtitles.original: いただきまーす！
subtitles.english: Let's eat!

subtitles.original: あー、おいしかったわー。
subtitles.english: Ah, that was delicious.

subtitles.original: いいケーキだからね。でっかいケーキ、最高だね。
subtitles.english: Because it's a good cake. A giant cake is the best, isn't it.

subtitles.original: もう、うちもケーキ食べたかったよ、これはー！
subtitles.english: Geez, I wanted to eat cake too, this time!

subtitles.original: 残りのケーキは、じゃあ白上が食べます！
subtitles.english: The rest of the cake, then, Shirakami will eat!

subtitles.original: おい、一瞬ケーキが小さくなっていく...
subtitles.english: Hey, in an instant the cake is getting smaller...

subtitles.original: あー、食べちゃった。お腹いっぱいになったー！
subtitles.english: Ah, I ate it all. I'm full now!

subtitles.original: いや、腹ごしらえもしましたし、ライブでもしますか！
subtitles.english: Well, now that we've had a meal, shall we do a live performance?

subtitles.original: なんだこれ！なんだこの流れは！
subtitles.english: What is this! What is this flow!

subtitles.original: うち、ケーキ一口しか食べてないよ！
subtitles.english: I only ate one bite of cake!

subtitles.original: じゃあ食後の運動ということで...
subtitles.english: Then, as exercise after a meal...

subtitles.original: せっかくライブ来てくれたんだから、二人とも歌ってくれるよね？
subtitles.english: Since you came to the live performance, both of you will sing, right?

subtitles.original: やったー！踊りましょー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's dance!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、ステージに付こうか。
subtitles.english: Then, let's head to the stage.

subtitles.original: この三人と行ったら、何ですか？ありますからね。
subtitles.english: Going with these three, what is it? There's that, you know.

subtitles.original: この三人と言えば、せーの！
subtitles.english: Speaking of these three, one, two...!

subtitles.original: 百花繚乱花吹雪！
subtitles.english: Hyakkaryouran Hanafubuki!

subtitles.original: 色付く想い、はせつな...
subtitles.english: Colorful feelings are fleeting...

subtitles.original: 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: Hyakkaryouran Hanafubuki

subtitles.original: パッと咲いて散った 花は終わりに、を告げてくる
subtitles.english: Flowers that bloom and fall suddenly, signal the end

subtitles.original: その時を待てど暮らせど 言葉進まず
subtitles.english: No matter how much I wait for that time, words don't come

subtitles.original: そっと触れてしまった 胸の内の温かさを
subtitles.english: I softly touched the warmth within my chest

subtitles.original: 初めてのこの気持ちだけ 抱きしめていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep embracing only this first-time feeling

subtitles.original: 暁交わした約束は 本物だってきっと
subtitles.english: The promise we exchanged at dawn, I'm sure it's real

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと、の、花に魅せられた少女たち
subtitles.english: Girls enchanted by the flowers of the alphabet

subtitles.original: あーはらりはらりはらり落ちる 花、共に舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, falling fluttering, fluttering, fluttering, flowers, let's dance together

subtitles.original: 惑う世なれど 想い、言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Though the world is confusing, I tried to put my feelings into words

subtitles.original: 誰も皆憧れる 浮世の理よ
subtitles.english: The logic of the floating world that everyone yearns for

subtitles.original: 色付く想い、はせつな 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: Colorful feelings are fleeting, Hyakkaryouran Hanafubuki

subtitles.original: フッと吹き消した 夜を灯す月明かりに
subtitles.english: With a puff, the moonlight that lights up the night was blown out

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心が揺れて 声は響かず
subtitles.english: My ambiguous heart wavers, and my voice doesn't ring out

subtitles.original: もっと触れたくて 夢をなぞる指先さえ
subtitles.english: Wanting to touch more, even my fingertips tracing the dream

subtitles.original: いつの日か馳せた形を 忘れかけてた
subtitles.english: I was starting to forget the form I once yearned for

subtitles.original: 浮世の波にたゆたう時 うたかたの夢は
subtitles.english: When drifting on the waves of the floating world, the ephemeral dream

subtitles.original: 弾けてく
subtitles.english: Will burst

subtitles.original: 有為の奥山に...
subtitles.english: In the deep mountains of existence...
